explains: v. 擦过；抓伤（graze 的现在分词）
wordGroup: grazing angle 入射余角；掠射角；切线角
grazing incidence 掠入射；切线入射；临界入射
sheep are grazing 羊在吃草

sentences.cn: 我数了有34只野山羊在吃草。

sentences.en: The cows are out now, grazing in the pasture.
sentences.cn: 牛群现在出去了，正在牧场上吃草。

sentences.en: He had nearly a thousand acres of grazing and arable land.
sentences.cn: 他拥有近千亩的牧场和可耕地。
